page.title: 04HOUSING
page.content:
{HOUSING { 41% properties are private rented. 40% owner occupied. 16% Braintree District Council. 3% private rented, furnished.
Several buildings within the village are Grade 2{listed buildings}of special architectural or historic interest. Belchamp St. Paul has recently been designated a {Conservation Area.}The central area of the village is worthy of this status mainly because the wealth and variety of buildings grouped around {Cole Green}warrent tighter environmental control to prevent the erosion of village character. The older properties are built of local materials... thatch, wattle and daub, red bricks or flint.
